ch_about:
> **||]about**
This command displays information about the bot, whether it's up to date is nebulous.
Example: ||]about
ch_help:
> **||]help**
Displays this menu, bolded words are purely stylistic.
Example: ||]help
mlib_bookmark:
> **||]bookmark**
Bookmarks your current page, given the relevant literture title.
Example: ||]bookmark 36 "Debt by David Graeber" (optional chapter) "Primordial Debts"
